    Pad object used to create playing pads.

    schme

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pad

        public Pad(EntityType type,
   float boardWidth,
   float boardHeight)
        Create a pad with a type and position (position depends on the type) Position coordinate is the top left corner of the pad.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of the pad.
        boardWidth - Width of the used board.
        boardHeight - Height of the used board.

      • moveWithin2D

        public boolean moveWithin2D(float spaceWidth,
                   float spaceHeight)
        Moves the pad within certain boundaries. Handles the acceleration of the pad when it has been in a continuous movement.
        Specified by:
        moveWithin2D in class Entity
        Parameters:
        spaceWidth - Spaces X boundary.
        spaceHeight - Spaces Y boundary.
